episodes.title: Korean Cult Leader Tricks Young Women Into Becoming ‘God’s Brides’
episodes.description:
In this video, we dive deep into the disturbing story of JMS (Jesus Morning Star) — a South Korean religious sect led by Jung Myung-seok, who proclaimed himself the Messiah and manipulated his followers with a twisted doctrine. He convinced young women that they were “God’s brides”, brainwashed them through love-bombing, and used his supposed spiritual authority to sexually exploit them.

Jung was first convicted in 2008 for rape, served 10 years in prison, and was released in 2018. But his crimes didn’t stop there: between 2018 and 2021, he allegedly sexually assaulted more female followers at his cult’s headquarters in Wolmyeongdong. In 2023, the court handed him a 23-year prison sentence.

#JMS #Cult #TrueCrime #Korea #ReligiousAbuse #JesusMorningStar #ProvidenceCult"

episodes.title: Evil Japanese Cults Still Operating Today
episodes.description:
On this video documentary you'll learn about 5 terrifying cults in Japan that are still active today and unfortunately not even the government can shut them down. 
Aleph (formerly Aum Shinrikyo) - The sarin gas attackers
Happy Science - The political cult with nationalist ideology
Unification Church (Moonies) - Connected to Shinzo Abe's assassination
Jehovah's Witnesses - The shunning practices and abuse cover-ups
Jikousan - Rural faith-healing cult with extreme practices

FAIR USE

This video is protected under fair use as it has been altered for educational purposes and includes commentary. The modifications serve to enhance the educational content, providing added value and transforming the original video's audience and intent.
